definition: lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: The rats are already praying and bowing before my product.
sentences.chinese: 這些鼠輩早就在祈禱了，而且對我的產品垂暮已久。

sentences.english: What should these mice do about a scary cat?
sentences.chinese: 遇到可怕的貓，這些鼠輩該如何是好？

sentences.english: We are the knights of the sky, the ghosts in the desert, and the rats in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我們是天空中的騎士，沙漠中的鬼魂和泥濘中的鼠輩。

sentences.english: It knows not the ways of the mole nor seeks it the holes of the serpent.
sentences.chinese: 它不諸熟鼠輩的路徑，也不尋跡蟲蛇的洞穴。
在這裏，我們叫他們鼠輩。

definition: to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
to use one's mouth (to say sth)
to judge between right and wrong/to reason things out
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
